description: This file defines an abstract interface for a recipe repository and a mock implementation with sample recipes. It facilitates fetching, searching, and retrieving recipes by ID, serving as a data layer component.

classes.name: IRecipeRepository
classes.description: Abstract interface outlining methods for fetching and searching recipes.

classes.name: MockRecipeRepository
classes.description: A mock in-memory implementation of the recipe repository, used for demo purposes with sample data.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Search recipes by a query string across title and ingredients.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieve a single recipe by its ID asynchronously.
